last_episode_to_air.name: Sins of My Father
last_episode_to_air.overview: As a boy, he watched his father go down a path of insanity. Now, as an Ivy League student, a tortured young man is having similar thoughts.

name: Haunted
overview: Real people sit down with friends and family to share terrifying true stories from their past, re-created through chilling re-enactments.

episodes.name: The Woman in White
episodes.overview: After moving into a new apartment with his family, a boy is haunted by frequent visions of a ghostly woman hanging in his closet.

episodes.name: The Slaughterhouse
episodes.overview: Two sisters grow up scared and alone in a real-life house of horrors, where their sadistic father does unspeakable things.

episodes.name: Demon in the Dark
episodes.overview: A young girl is convinced that a dark evil dwells in her grandmother's basement, where a twisted family member once dabbled in the occult.

episodes.name: Children of the Well
episodes.overview: A decrepit old well in the basement connects a young boy to the spirits of three dead children who implore him to come down and play.

episodes.name: Alien Infection
episodes.overview: Otherworldly sightings -- and vivid flashbacks of unsettling medical procedures -- plague a young woman for the rest of her life.

episodes.name: Stolen Gravestone
episodes.overview: A once-protective spirit becomes possessive when the young girl who inherited his tombstone meets and marries the love of her life.

episodes.name: The Mimic
episodes.overview: In an old house with a horrible history, a young woman starts hearing her roommates' voices ... even when they're not really there.

episodes.name: Ward of Evil
episodes.overview: A nurse working with dementia patients at an assisted living facility comes face-to-face with a resident who emits a disturbing energy.

episodes.name: Cult of Torture
episodes.overview: A scarred man shares details of the hellish abuse he endured in a brutal gay conversion program at the New Bethany Home for Boys.

episodes.name: Spirits from Below
episodes.overview: Years after leaving their family home, traumatized siblings and their loved ones recall the terrible things that happened while they lived there.

episodes.name: Demon of War
episodes.overview: A U.S. Marine who doesn't scare easily is shaken to the core when he's confronted by a demon with glowing eyes while serving in Afghanistan.

episodes.name: Born Cursed
episodes.overview: A boy who enters the world under special circumstances grows up convinced that an evil figure he calls "The Hangman" is following him and his family.

episodes.name: In the Pines
episodes.overview: Young lovers discover a hidden room in their remote cabin, inadvertently releasing an evil that physically attacks them.

episodes.name: Haunted by Henry
episodes.overview: A mother and her children face a series of unsettling events after moving into the former home of a 19th-century mining magnate.

episodes.name: Gift of Evil
episodes.overview: An engraved music box with a ghostly melody connects a lonely teen to the spirit of a little girl who's returned from her watery grave.

episodes.name: The Witch Behind the Wall
episodes.overview: Siblings plagued by violent hauntings discover that the unfriendly old woman living next door has built an eerily accurate model of their house.

episodes.name: Demon Cat
episodes.overview: Inside a home filled with strange howls and hisses, a demonic creature that looks like a cat breeds horrifying memories.

episodes.name: Sins of My Father
episodes.overview: As a boy, he watched his father go down a path of insanity. Now, as an Ivy League student, a tortured young man is having similar thoughts.
